page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: In l985 most people have cars. Cars are motor driven vehicles which can take up to 5or 6 people in one go. Cars have 4 wheels (some have 3) which are what they travel on. The car has a hard shell orbody and 4windows which are possible to wind down (depending on what size car you have) There are many names for cars, e.g. Ford Granada. Air travel is very popular today the things that are used are called aeroplanes. These can range from the giant galaxy carrier aircraft to the small 4 man Cesna. Thruxton is a place near Andover where there is an air field where planes take off and land from. In Andover people can travel locally on the bus or double decker. A double decker is a machine with a long fusilage and is two single deckers high so this is what transport is like today.
